Anthropologie's Double-Discount Home Sale Is Here

Story from Home

Anthropologie's Double-Discount Home Sale Is Here

Elizabeth Buxton
See All Slides
Begin Slideshow
Photo: Courtesty of Anthropologie.
If you aren't partaking in an egg hunt this weekend, then maybe the thrill of sale-hunting will entice you: starting today and lasting through Easter Sunday, Anthropologie is hosting a huge double-sale. The stylish lifestyle store's offers span from an extra 50% off already marked down decor items to an extra 20% off discounted furniture finds.
With price-slashes on items like chic dinnerware, retro chairs, gilded accessories, plush bedding, and more, our dreamy design goals are actually more within reach this season. But no need to hunt through a field of products and pages to score the best elegant steals, because we've crafted a super-sale treasure map for your use ahead. If you've been saving up for a bigger-budget home buy, then now's the time to shop the limited-time sale items currently available for less of a serious splurge. Who needs a plastic egg filled with jelly beans when you can snag a beautiful, bohemian area rug for half-off instead?
At Refinery29, we’re here to help you navigate this overwhelming world of stuff. All of our market picks are independently selected and curated by the editorial team. If you buy something we link to on our site, Refinery29 may earn commission.
